text: Scarlett Johansson has exited the drama film “ Rub and Tug ” a little more than a week after her casting sparked backlash amid trans groups and activists, a source with knowledge of the situation confirms to Variety. “ In light of recent ethical questions raised surrounding my casting as Dante Tex Gill, I have decided to respectfully withdraw my participation in the project, ” Johansson told Out Magazine, which first reported the news, in a statement. “ Our cultural understanding of transgender people continues to advance, and I ’ ve learned a lot from the community since making my first statement about my casting and realize it was insensitive. I have great admiration and love for the trans community and am grateful that the conversation regarding inclusivity in Hollywood continues.
